{% load djinfo_tags %} {# LISTS #} {% if value|is_list or value|is_set or value|is_tuple %}
    {% for subval in value %}
  • {% include "djinfo/setting-value.inc.html" with value=subval only %}
    • {% endfor %}
{# DICTS #} {% elif value|is_dict %} {% if value.keys|length == 0 %} {}, {% else %}
{% for subkey, subval in value.items %}
{{ subkey }}
{% include "djinfo/setting-value.inc.html" with value=subval only %}
{% endfor %}
{% endif %} {# LINKS #} {% elif value|is_link %} {{ value }} {% else %} {{ value }} {% endif %}
